definition: to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: It can plot diversified Isoline Figure and 3-D solid figure.
sentences.chinese: 可以繪製各種等值線圖和三維立體圖。

sentences.english: The construction of cross-sections and block diagrams is also outlined.
sentences.chinese: 本書還概述了橫剖面和立體圖的製作法。

sentences.english: But it would take a long time to render stereoscopic images.
sentences.chinese: 但是生成立體圖卻需要花費較長的繪製時間。

sentences.english: The edges of shapes and forms also create lines.
sentences.chinese: 平面圖和立體圖的邊緣也構成線。

sentences.english: Draw three views according to pictorial drawing ( the front view is looked from S).
sentences.chinese: 根據立體圖，畫出相應的三視圖。

sentences.english: Random-dot stereograms (RDS) do not have monocular cue in testing stereopsis .
sentences.chinese: 亂點立體圖是不具單眼線索的立體感測試工具。

sentences.english: Complementary colour cubic picture is an effective method to display cubic pictures.
sentences.chinese: 補色立體圖是一種有效的立體圖形顯示方法。

sentences.english: Now you understand the theory of stereogram, let's try to see them!
sentences.chinese: 現在你理解了立體圖的原因，讓我們試着理解。
